questions.text: In a group setting, I naturally tend to...
choices: Take charge and lead the group
Contribute ideas but let others lead

questions.text: When someone shares a problem with me, I usually...
choices: Share a similar experience I've had
Ask questions to help them think it through

questions.text: At social gatherings, I prefer groups that are...
choices: Large and lively with lots of energy
Medium-sized with a mix of people
Small and intimate with close friends

questions.text: When making group decisions, I believe we should...
choices: Let the most knowledgeable person decide

questions.text: My role in my friend group is usually...
choices: The organizer who makes plans happen
The cheerleader who keeps spirits up
The wise advisor people come to
The fun one who brings the laughs
